Welcome to TrailGear Pro

These Terms of Service govern your use of the TrailGear Pro website (explorenationalparks.store) and the purchase of our premium hiking gear and expert guides for America's most stunning national parks.

Standard Shipping

5-7 business days

Express Shipping

Overnight

Delivery times are estimates and may vary due to weather, holidays, or other circumstances beyond our control. Risk of loss passes to the buyer upon delivery to the address provided.

Adventure-Ready Return Policy

We understand that the right gear is essential for your safety and enjoyment. That's why we offer a comprehensive return policy.

Return Window: You may return most items within 30 days of delivery for a full refund, and within 1 year for store credit.

Condition Requirements:

  • Items must be in original condition with tags attached

  • Items showing excessive wear or damage will not be accepted
  • Custom or personalized items cannot be returned unless defective

Return Process: Contact our customer service team to initiate a return. We'll provide a prepaid return label for your convenience.

Refund Timeline: Refunds will be processed within 5-10 business days after we receive and inspect the returned items.

All products sold through TrailGear Pro come with manufacturer warranties. Additionally, we provide our own quality guarantee:
